sqlMap.select: select rm_name from room_list group by rm_name

select rm_room from room_list where rm_name=#rm_name#
order by rm_room asc
select min(rm_price) as min_price, max(rm_price) as max_price from room_list where rm_name=#rm_name#
select rm_img, rm_loc, rm_phone from room_list where rm_name=#rm_name# and rownum=1
select rm_name, rm_img, rm_loc, rm_phone,rm_comment from room_list where rm_name=#rm_name# and rownum=1

select rm_room, rm_person, rm_price from room_list where rm_name=#rm_name#
order by rm_room asc
